answerText: Pinnacles National Park[10] In March, land in this state was taken to form the Rio Grande del Norte National Monument. This state is also home to White Sands National Monument and Carlsbad Caverns.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 10 | 21 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Answer the following regarding the creation of new national parks and monuments, for 10 points each. [10] In January 2013, this former National Monument, located in central California, became the newest National Park in the United States. It is named for spire-like features that resulted from erosion of an extinct volcano.
